name: Babel (Diaz_am)
description:
Babel is a game where you throw a dagger and can then teleport to it.

With this mechanic you can reach enemies and kill them to progress through the Tower.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Moveset:


Throwing dagger - Right mouse button

Teleport to dagger - Right mouse button (after you've thrown the dagger)

(Double) Jump - Space bar (jump resets after teleport)

Attack - Left Mouse Button

Pause Menu - Esc

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
GameVersion.0.2
